title: Authorizes a governmental agency or municipality to designate a highway or portion of highway as open for travel by an ATV
summary: Authorizes a governmental agency, by rule or regulation, or municipality, by local law ordinance, to designate a highway or portion of highway as open for travel by an ATV in order to gain access to areas or trails adjacent to such highways.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to designation of highways and public lands for travel by ATVs
